datatable.title: PUBLIC CONTRACTS
datatable.publicationDate: Date of publication of the contract notice
datatable.noOfCompaniesWhoDownloadedTenderDoc: Nr. of the EO that have downloaded the tender dossier
datatable.publicationDateOfGivenContract: Date of publication of the contract award notice
datatable.cancellationNoticeDate: Date of publication of cancellation of notice
datatable.name: Name of the EO to whom the contract is awarded
datatable.implementationDeadlineStartingDate: Date of commencement of contract implementation
datatable.totalAmountOfContractsIncludingTaxes: Total value of the contract, including all taxes

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Prishtina of the future is a city with efficient and quality services which aim to improve the general well-being of its citizens.A city with real urban planning and spatial planning that makes the capital a safe haven for a socio-economic, cultural, educational, sporting life, and ensuring the well-being and quality of life for the citizens of Pristina.A municipality with a model of efficient and transparent governance, and as such, serve as a model for governance in other municipalities in Kosovo, thus contributing to the growth of welfare for all citizens of Kosovo.
aboutUs.projectDescription: The platform was developed for the Municipality of Prishtina, in order to provide information on the procurement processes/contracts regarding the institution. On this website, persons can be informed about the value of a contract, the winner of the contract, when the contract is expected to be implemented by, and will have access to open data sets as well. Furthermore, ‘Kontratat e Hapura’ provides users with visualizations of procurement data over the years, so that comparisons can be made.
